attributes.value: Views loyalty unfavorably
Values family
Values cunning
Values tradition
Values artwork
Values cooperation
Doesn't respect a society that has settled into harmony without debate and strife
Values good craftsmanship
Believes that perseverance is one of the greatest qualities somebody can have
Values peace over war
Often feels discouraged
Rarely looks on others with lust
Is impervious to the effects of stress
Feels best when everyone gets along without any strife or contention
Is very impolite and inconsiderate of propriety
Is extremely confident of herself in situations requiring her skills
Could not care less about her appearance, talents or other personal vanities
Accepts favors without developing a sense of obligation, preferring to act as the current situation demands
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Tends to be a bit stubborn in changing her mind about things
Is sloppy with her living space
Only rarely tries to assert herself in conversation
Is not readily moved by art or natural beauty
Tough
Susceptible to disease
The ability to focus
A sum of patience
